welcome_message_body: Welcome to Clearwater, where the sun always shines and the sugar-white beaches beckon. Known for its stunning coastline, vibrant arts scene, and delicious seafood, we invite you to explore and soak in the charm of our beautiful city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Rumba Island Bar & Grill
restaurants.description: Rumba Island Bar & Grill is a caribbean restaurant located in Clearwater.
restaurants.address: 1800 Gulf To Bay Blvd (at Keene Rd.), Clearwater, FL 33765

restaurants.description: Sunset Grill is a american restaurant located in Clearwater.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger comfort.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Airport caters to private and corporate jets, offering exclusive services and facilities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained from the information desk.
